message:
Great post by @antoniovincent. You may not see it but the ripple effect of helping just one person can be endless. Share your way of making someone’s day a little brighter. @get_repost #repost 
・・・
It only takes one word, one conversation, one smile, one phone call, one text, and one person to change someone else's life. I challenge you to be THAT one and change someone's life. Do it because the world needs it & people need you ❤️ #life #hope #love #createchange
